text: @realDonaldTrump Am ready to Vote ‼️ You seem confused about the Swamp we want Gone💯 The one headed by the Person who called Covid-19 a Hoax‼️ He’ll confuse us to our Graves, can’t let that happen bye 👋 @realDonaldTrump  SWAMP 😡💔
